attributes.action: enforce laws on leashing dogs in public places on the Brickpits park and Fearnhead Lane, Warrington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The law clearly spells out dog owner's responsibilities in public places, so the petitioner is asking the P.M. to address why this is not happening in my local area. How can this situation be improved to ensure the greater 
happiness of the greatest number ?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
